Fortunately, as the season neared its end, some couples began approaching their relationships more sincerely. Nic and Cierra became the first couple of the season to commit exclusively to each other during a one-on-one date outside the villa. However, their relationship was cut short when Cierra was unexpectedly removed from the villa in Episode 30.

In Episode 32, Taylor thoughtfully choreographed a cheer that all the boys participated in to ask Clarke to be exclusive with him. Unfortunately, the couple was eliminated later in the episode after receiving the fewest votes from America. And again on Episode 34, after closing things off, Ace and Chelley also were dumped from the villa.
Now, the finale will reveal which couples have found genuine connections worth fighting for.
What Time Is the 'Love Island USA' Season 7 Finale On?
The “Love Island USA” Season 7 finale will begin at 6 p.m. PT/9 p.m. ET on Sunday, July 13, with host Ariana Madix returning to the villa to guide viewers through the final moments.
Where to Watch the 'Love Island Usa' Season 7 Finale
The “Love Island USA” Season 7 finale will be available to stream on Peacock on Sunday, July 13.
Viewers had the chance to cast their votes on the “Love Island USA” app to help determine which couple will be crowned the winners.

America’s vote ultimately decides the fate of the final couples, so you can have the final say in which couple comes out on top. Voting typically closes shortly before the finale airs, so fans should cast their votes early.
Peacock is owned by NBCUniversal, TODAY’s parent company.
Which Couples Are in the Finale?
Four couples currently remain in the “Love Island USA” villa and have a shot at the $100,000 cash prize:
Amaya and BryanOlandria and NicIris and PepeHuda and Chris
Amaya and Bryan
Olandria and Nic
Iris and Pepe
Huda and Chris

The finale follows the show’s traditional format, where America’s vote determines the winning couple. But the real drama comes after the results are announced. The victorious couple must then face the show’s ultimate test: they can either split the prize money equally between them, or one partner can choose to keep the entire $100,000 for themselves.
With the season’s romantic journey finally reaching its climax, viewers won’t want to miss the finale to see if love truly conquered all in the villa.

title: How Madea Fans Are Reacting to Tyler Perry's ‘Madea’s Destination Wedding’
summary: Madea, the street-smart and sometimes unhinged matriarch of the Simmons family, is back in action and fans are weighing in on the return of the beloved character.
story: Madea, the street-smart and sometimes unhinged matriarch of the Simmons family, is back in action and fans are weighing in on the return of the beloved character.

On July 11, Tyler Perry released his latest Madea movie, “Madea’s Destination Wedding,” on Netflix after a three-year hiatus. The film follows Madea (Perry) and the rest of the Simmons family as they make their way to the Bahamas to celebrate Brian’s daughter’s wedding.

Throughout the nearly two-hour film, Madea, along with Madea's brother Joe (Perry) and other family members get into squabbles, drama and the usual shenanigans that are often synonymous whenever Madea's involved.

Fans got a glimpse of what to expect last month when Netflix dropped the official trailer for “Madea’s Destination Wedding” on YouTube. In the comments section, fans appeared to be “excited” over the forthcoming release, with one fan saying, “Madea is always hilarious to watch.”

Another said they found watching Madea therapeutic, writing, “Madea has helped me through A LOT and ironic enough is why I am no longer hot headed or quick to make decisions. Tyler is amazing and I hope he continues to do these so many generations can partake in his wisdom.”
Meanwhile, another fan added, “Can’t wait to see this!! & I hope Tyler Perry makes more MADEA MOVIES,“ before adding three heart emjois.

Perry’s latest Madea film comes three years after “A Madea Homecoming,” which released in February 2022 on Netflix. That film came as a surprise to many fans since Perry had announced in 2019 that he would officially retire his Madea character after “A Madea Family Funeral.”
“It’s been a great run, but I think it’s time. It’s time,” he said on TODAY in February 2019.
Now, after the release of “Madea’s Destination Wedding,” Perry's 13th Madea film, fans of the filmmaker are once again reacting to the filmmaker's latest go-round of his over-the-top character.
One fan said they “couldn’t get enough” of the Perry’s comedy.
“Watched it twice this morning, couldn’t get enough…. I (laughing emojis)  Madea still even wiser,” the fan wrote, adding a fire, hand clap and thumbs up emoji.
Another fan shared her reaction in real time, writing, “Hubby and I are watching it now! Hilarious.”
A third fan was a bit more critical, writing it was “good,” while noting they’ve “seen better” from Perry. “I would definitely rate this at 6.5 or 7/10...,” the person wrote on X.
Still, other fans weren't as impressed, with one saying it's wasn't quite worth the watch.
“What a boring movie wasted my 1 hour 44 minutes. I give this a -1 rating,” a commenter on X wrote.

Another fan had similar sentiments, writing on X, “This movie was horrible, the worst Madea movie in awhile. Please sir, hire some writers and new hair/makeup people! That took 2 hours off my life for no good reason.”
The person also gave some advice to Perry, referencing Ryan Coogler's blockbuster horror film starring Michael B. Jordan.
“Sinners set a new standard. Get there!” the person added.

While reactions online varied, Perry took to social media to share his takeaway from the film's release. In a July 11 Instagram post, Perry shared that his new film had hit No. 1 in the U.S. on Netflix.
“I can’t thank you enough and I don’t take this or you for granted,” he captioned his post. “This is movie number 30 and y’all still riding with me! Thankful.”
A few hours later, Perry followed up his celebratory post with another one, noting that his previous film, “A Madea’s Homecoming,” was also now back in the Top 10 on the streamer.
“Wait!! What y’all doing! Sending Madea Homecoming to the Top 10!! WOW!,” he wrote, captioning an Instagram post.

Perry has also seen much success at the box office when his Madea films hit theaters. According to Box Office Mojo, his 2009 comedy “Madea Goes to Jail” was his highest-grossing Madea movie to date. That flick earned over $90 million, with “Madea’s Witness Protection” coming in second at $65 million and “Madea’s Family Reunion” in third at $63 million.
Tyler Perry's “Madea’s Destination Wedding” is now available to stream on Netflix.

title: Princess Charlotte Has Adorable Reaction to Wimbledon Match While Sitting Next to Mom Kate Middleton
summary: The Prince and Princess of Wales made an appearance at the men’s final at Wimbledon with their children in tow.
story: The Prince and Princess of Wales made an appearance at the men’s final at Wimbledon with their children in tow.
Prince William and Catherine, Princess of Wales, attended the men’s singles final at All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club on Sunday, July 13.

William and the former Kate Middleton were joined by their two oldest children, Prince George, 11, and Princess Charlotte, 10. Prince Louis, 7, who is known for his silly antics at public engagements, did not attend the match with his family
William and Kate and their children donned coordinating ensembles for the occasion, wearing shades of blue and white.

Kate wore a short-sleeved royal blue tea-length dress, with a dramatic ruffle on one shoulder, paired with a sunhat and brown heels. Charlotte wore a white dress that featured a black-trimmed ruffle detail on the top along with a pair of white flats.

William wore a navy blue double-breasted blazer over a white shirt and a navy blue and white polka dot tie with a pair of light-colored pants. George followed a similar color scheme, wearing a navy blazer and matching pants over a light blue shirt and navy and white striped tie.
The family sat together in the royal box at Centre Court, with George and Charlotte sitting between their parents during the match between Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz.

While Louis typically steals the show with his reactions and antics at outings, Charlotte had her own fair share of moments captured during the match. At one point, she was photographed with her hands covering her mouth, seemingly in shock.
This is the second Wimbledon outing for Kate this weekend.
The Princess of Wales attended the women’s singles final at Wimbledon solo on Saturday, July 12, though she was seated next to tennis legend Billie Jean King during the match.
Her attendance marked her first appearance at Wimbledon since announcing her cancer was in remission back in January.

At the conclusion of the match between Amanda Anisimova and Iga Świątek, Kate, who has been the patron of the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club since 2016, presented Świątek with the trophy following her victory.

In 2024, Kate only attended the men’s singles final, which marked her second public appearance after announcing her cancer diagnosis in March 2024. She attended the event with her daughter, Charlotte, where she received a standing ovation from the crowd.
Since then, Kate completed her chemotherapy treatment in September 2024, announcing that she would be returning to attending more regular public engagements.
After sharing that her cancer was in remission at the beginning of this year, Kate expressed that it was “a relief” and that she would “remain focused on recovery.”

“As anyone who has experienced a cancer diagnosis will know, it takes time to adjust to a new normal,” she said in a statement at the time. “I am however looking forward to a fulfilling year ahead. There is much to look forward to.”

title: Jessica Simpson Steps Out in See-Through Dress and Darker Hair To Celebrate 45th Birthday
summary: Jessica Simpson stepped out on her birthday with a brand new look
story: Jessica Simpson stepped out on her birthday with a brand new look.
Simpson, who turned 45 on July 10, shared several photos from her celebration at Chateau Marmont on Instagram July 11.

In the pictures, the singer donned a see-through dress adorned with a sparkly, beaded netting that matched the garment's top and collar. She completed her look with a long, black jacket and a coordinating clutch.
Simpson also debuted her new hairstyle in the photos, switching up her staple platinum blonde with a darker, dirty blonde, which she styled in loose waves.
Simpson’s post featured several solo shots of the singer, including a photo posting with her birthday cake.
Other pictures captured Simpson posing with her friends during their night out, including a group shot showing off their glam ensembles for the evening.
“Fancy dive into 45,” Simpson captioned the post.
She received plenty of love in the comment section for her birthday, including from her sister, Ashlee Simpson, who wrote, “45. Ever looked better angel queen. Love you so much! This is your year.”
Their mom, Tina Simpson, added, “Happy Birthday my sweet girl! 45 looks real good on you! So thankful to be your Mommy. I love you.”

On her birthday, Simpson also shared a sultry video on Instagram to promote her single “Fade.” The tune is set to appear on “Nashville Canyon, Part 2,” which comes months after she premiered the first half of her EP back in March.
“To start off my 45th year’round the sun, Imma gonna bright side the journey of life by choosin’ to be the HAPPY part of my BIRTHDAY,” she wrote in the caption.
In recent years, switching up her hairstyle isn't the only transformation that Simpson has gone through.

She’s been candid about her health, including her experience with sobriety and weight loss, as well as her return to music, which included her March 2025 single “Leave” and first TV performance in 15 years in May 2025.

In September 2019, Simpson shared that she had lost 100 pounds after welcoming her third child, Birdie Mae. At the time, she was also several years into her sobriety journey, telling TODAY Parents in September 2020 that she was nearly three years sober at the time, citing her children as her motivation.

Simpson hasn’t shied away from the impact that public body-shaming has had on her, either, telling People in March 2021, “I spent so many years beating myself up for an unrealistic body standard that made me feel like a failure all of the time.”

During an August 2023 interview with Access Hollywood, Simpson spoke about how she navigated her past public scrutiny with her three children, telling the outlet, “Now my kids see me being still scrutinized, and it’s very confusing to them.”

“They’re like, ‘Well, I don’t even understand this,’” she added. “Like, ‘Why don’t they just say you look pretty, Mommy? You look pretty.’ I wish I could explain it. I wish I could say that, for me, it’s gotten better, but it still remains the same, and I don’t know why.”

title: Kate Middleton Makes Joyful Appearance at Wimbledon Sitting Next to Tennis Legend Billie Jean King
summary: Catherine, Princess of Wales, arrived at Wimbledon to a standing ovation, marking a notable public appearance after announcing her remission from cancer
story: Catherine, Princess of Wales, arrived at Wimbledon to a standing ovation, marking a notable public appearance after announcing her remission from cancer.
The former Kate Middleton attended the women’s final on Saturday, July 12, to watch the matchup between Amanda Anisimova and Iga Swiatek.
At the event, she donned a cream-colored set, which included a short-sleeved belted jacket top paired with a tea-length pleated skirt and nude heels.
During the women’s final, she was seated in the royal box at the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club next to tennis legend Billie Jean King.
The women’s final match ended in defeat for Anisimova, who was bested 6-0, 6-0 by Swiatek, marking her sixth Grand Slam title.
After the win, Kate, who has been the patron of the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club since 2016, presented Swiatek with the women’s singles trophy on the court.

Last year, Kate attended the men’s singles final alongside daughter Princess Charlotte in July 2024, which marked only her second public appearance after announcing her cancer diagnosis in March of that year.
Her attendance was widely celebrated, with Kate receiving a round of applause as well as a standing ovation as she made her way to the royal box.

Over the last year and a half, Kate has faced several public health issues, including undergoing “planned abdominal surgery” in January 2024. Months later in March 2024, Kate announced in a video statement that she was diagnosed with cancer and was in the “early stages” of undergoing preventive chemotherapy.

Kate announced in September 2024 that she had completed her chemotherapy treatment and would return to making more public appearances. At the time, she said, “Life as you know it can change in an instant and we have had to find a way to navigate the stormy waters and road unknown.”

It was announced in January this year that Kate’s cancer was in remission. In a statement shared to social media at the time, the royal called the news “a relief,” noting that she now would “remain focused on recovery.”

Earlier this month, Kate gave rare comments about her experience with cancer at a hospital in Essex, England. Per video from BBC, Kate told patients, “You put on a sort of brave face (with) stoicism through treatment. (When) treatment’s done, then it’s like, ‘I can crack on, get back to normal again.’”

Kate noted that going back to normal after completing treatment isn’t always the reality for many patients, adding, “But actually the phase afterwards is really difficult. You’re not necessarily under the clinical team any longer, but you’re not able to function normally at home as you perhaps once used to.”
“You have to find your new normal and that takes time,” she said.

title: Watch NBA Star Donovan Mitchell Propose to Coco Jones in Sweet Video
summary: Coco Jones and Donovan Mitchell are engaged! See their engagement photo.
story: Coco Jones and Donovan Mitchell are engaged!
The Grammy-winning singer-songwriter and Cleveland Cavaliers point guard announced their engagement with photos on Instagram on July 11.

On Instagram, Jones simply shared a shot of her kissing Mitchell with her left hand on his chest as the sun beamed from behind. On her left ring finger, she donned what appeared to be a impressive diamond engagement ring.
Mitchell, nicknamed Spida, also shared the same photo on Instagram, but added a second slide that appeared to capture the moment when he proposed to Jones.
In the clip, Mitchell is seen getting down on one knee before Jones appears to accept his proposal and the two embrace.
TODAY.com reached out for comment but did not hear back at the time of publication.
In the comment section of his post, fellow athletes and celebrities sent their well wishes to the couple.
Dwyane Wade commented, "Love."
The official Adidas Instagram account wrote, "Congrats SPIDA," with a teary-eyed and red heart emoji.
In the comment section of Jones' post, many fellow artists shared their thoughts on the engagement news.
Singer Ella Mai wrote, "periodddddddddddddddd," with the celebration and red heart emoji.
Singer-actor Chloe Bailey also chimed in, writing, "makes me the happiest," with five heart-eyed emoji.
Though rumors have swirled around the two bring romantically involved, they have rarely spoken about their relationship.
On The Breakfast Club podcast in April, Jones opened up about where she is at this point in her life, in her music and in her relationship with Mitchell.
“I’ve grown,” she said, later adding, “Music is all of the things. It’s in love. It’s late night. It’s anger. It’s all the emotions.”
When asked if her “bae” is Mitchell, Jones responded, “I’m happy! And that’s all I’m going to say about it. People already know. Y’all know.”

On the Club Shay Shay podcast in February, host Shannon Sharpe asked Jones about the internet spotting her and Mitchell out together, to which she responded, “I love that. Little spies everywhere. I feel like I’m in a detective movie.”

She explained at the time, “Secrecy is not what I prefer. I don’t want to ever feel like I have to be somebody’s secret. I don’t want to make anybody feel like they’re mine. I think, for me, I’m trying to protect myself, and I’m trying to protect my family and whoever I love. So, yeah, I am more private.”

title: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner Enjoy Baseball Game in Rare Family Outing With Kids
summary: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner enjoyed a recent family outing with their kids at a baseball game
story: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner enjoyed a recent family outing with their kids at a baseball game.
Affleck and Garner were spotted at Fenway Park July 11 for a matchup between the Boston Red Sox and the Tampa Bay Rays.
The former couple, who were previously married for a decade, attended the game with their two youngest children, Samuel and Seraphina. Their oldest child, Violet, did not appear to be in attendance.

Several photos of the family appeared online, and the official X account for MLB shared a video of the group in their seats. Affleck, who grew up in Massachusetts, and Samuel both donned a green Red Sox hat at the game. Garner showed her support to the team by wearing a red and white striped t-shirt.

The last time the couple were publicly spotted at an outing with with their kids was in 2024 when Affleck reunited with his ex-wife on Thanksgiving for The Midnight Mission’s Thanksgiving Day Celebration to help feed homeless people in Los Angeles.

Affleck and Garner got married in June 2005 before announcing in June 2015 that they would be getting divorced. The couple, who welcomed three children together, officially divorced in 2018 after a long separation.
Since their split, Affleck and Garner have maintained an amicable relationship and continue to co-parent their three kids.
Garner celebrated her ex-husband on Father’s Day this year, sharing a photo of Affleck on her Instagram story back in June.

In the throwback photo, Affleck lounged on a couch with a newborn sleeping on his chest. The actor shared a sweet message alongside the photo, writing, “Happy Father’s Day to 3 people’s favorite landing spot.”
Affleck also took a recent opportunity to share how he and Garner have handled co-parenting their children.

During a March 2025 interview with GQ, the “Good Will Hunting” star told the publication, “I’m really lucky that I have a really good co-parent and partner in Jennifer Garner, the kids’ mom, who’s wonderful and great and we work together well.”
He also shared insight into how he has been able to navigate fame and fatherhood, including the effects of tabloids on his kids.

Affleck explained, “We used to have a thing, my ex-wife and I, when (the kids) would see something on a supermarket stand, we would say, ‘Well, you know this isn’t always true because if it were, you would have 15 brothers or sisters or whatever the number of stories is where they said that your mom was pregnant.’”
Earlier this year, Affleck was seen enjoying an outing with Samuel in February at an NBA game in Los Angeles.

title: What’s It Really Like to Co-Host Jenna & Friends? Dwyane Wade Showed Us
summary: Join TODAY.com in finding out what a day in the life of a Jenna & Friends co-host is really like when Dwyane Wade hosts the week of July 7. Follow along behind the scenes.
story: It’s barely light out when Dwyane Wade arrives at 30 Rockefeller Plaza.
Traveling into Midtown Manhattan from Long Island, Wade has been on the road since before 5 a.m., “because of the tunnels” and all.

It’s Day 3 of his week-long co-hosting gig on TODAY with Jenna & Friends, and he’s escorted into the building by a single security guard. It’s still too early for the tourists, so the atrium near Studio 1A is silent and empty.

Soon it’ll be filled with show guests booked on TODAY for July 9, like “Superman” stars David Corenswet and Rachel Brosnahan and WWE’s Nikki Bella, as well as onlookers from the TODAY plaza, peeking through the windows, hoping to get a glimpse of some of their favorite personalities.
Though it’s an early roll call, Wade shows up with a warm smile on his face and he bends his 6’4” frame down for a hug. There’s no trace of anxiety over the long day ahead.
As one of the most decorated shooting guards in NBA history, combating nerves is familiar territory — and if he’s got them today, he isn't letting on.

It’s Wade’s second time co-hosting with Jenna Bush Hager. So, while he’s not a seasoned pro quite yet, it’s not his first rodeo either. The NBA hall of famer co-hosted for a week earlier this year in March, stepping in as one of the many co-hosts that have joined the show since Hoda Kotb’s departure in January.
And even though he doesn’t need to show up as early as he does, it’s part of his routine.
“I get here at 6:30 a.m. to give myself time to do all the things I need to do. I do not like rushing,” he says.

From the live show at 10 a.m. to a variety of segment tapings in between, Wade has a full schedule of events ahead, and he invites TODAY.com to go behind the scenes with him for the day, to find out what it’s really like to be a co-host for Jenna & Friends.
6:30 AM: Getting in the Zone
By the time Wade walks into his green room, the vibe has already been set.

Donato Smith and Sam Fine, Wade’s barber and makeup artist, respectively, have been preparing for his arrival. There’s a candle on the vanity, along with an assortment of items neatly spread out including eye drops, razors, a music speaker and medicine for the toothache he’s been battling.
“It just showed up on Monday,” Wade says of the unexpected setback. “It was about seven hours of throbbing, and I was like, ‘I’m going to have to call out tomorrow, but that’s not going to be good.’”
Fortunately, a prescription of antibiotics has helped take the edge off, and the sick day is averted. But once the week is over, he’ll need to see his dentist. Stat.

Sitting on a nearby couch is Wade’s cousin, Kenny Kinder. According to Kinder, he’s Wade’s housekeeper but not in the traditional sense. Rather, he’s someone who’s been invited in to help out and is a trusted part of the family.
So much so, that he, Wade, and four other members of their inner circle share the same rose tattoo, calling themselves the “Rose Boys.”

While Wade and Kinder chat, Fine sticks on a couple of eye patches. They seem unnecessary since it doesn’t appear like Wade has any morning bags, but since he’s going to be on live television, it can’t hurt.

title: Who Went Home on 'Love Island USA' Tonight, July 11?
summary: Spoilers ahead for “Love Island USA” Season 7, Episode 34
story: Spoilers ahead for “Love Island USA” Season 7, Episode 34.

We're getting closer to the “Love Island USA” Season 7 finale, and the couples are either making things official or falling apart. But before the favorite couple gets crowned the winner, one has to exit the villa.
It's been a headline-making week, which included Cierra’s abrupt exit and Taylor and Clarke's elimination after making their relationship exclusive.
On the July 8 episode, tensions arose between Huda and Chris and continued during the July 10 episode after he told her he was “low-key checked out.”

Meanwhile, Amaya and Bryan snuck away for a private night inside the Hideaway during the July 8 episode, followed by Chelley and Ace on July 10, while Nic and Olandria continued to explore their feelings for each other.
